summary: New texture for the female version of the Archmage robe.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
IMPORTANT NOTE: I am happy to allow anybody to use my work in your mods. Anything I make, and release, can be considered a modders resource. 

However, this only applies to those who are providing the work freely. You may NOT use my work in any mod that you intend to accept donations for. I do not work so you can profit off my efforts. Please respect my wishes.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~




Version 2 of the female archmage robe is up. 

Grunged up the textures and added a normal/specular map to fit the diffuse

I left the original files up for those who may prefer the less grungy diffuse texture.

Installation: Merge into your data folder.
Uninstall: Remove all files in the textures>clothes>archmage>\"f\" folder.
author: AnOldFriend
